dsm.parameters

Class FeatTransf

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsm.parameters.FeatTransf

  • public class FeatTransf
extends java.lang.Object
    The class representing the feature transformation (FeatTransf) parameter of the DSM.

    Usage of this parameter:

    String FeatTransf: the feature transformation used
    • "NoTransf": no feature transformation
    • FeatureTransformationType FeatureTransformationFunction: the type of feature transformation, with a feature transformation function

    String FeatureTransformationType: the type of feature transformation
    • "Freq": transformation of feature counts
    • "WeightBefNorm": transformation of feature weights before possible smoothing and normalization
    • "WeightAftNorm": transformation of feature weights after possible smoothing and normalization

    String FeatureTransformationFunction: the type of feature transformation
    • "Lb": modified logarithm function
    • "Sqrt": modified square root function
    • "Sq": modified square function
    • "Cu": modified cubic function
    • "Sigm": sigmoid function
    • "P1D2": plus 1 divided by 2 function
    • "Rank": rank function

    For more information about the transformation functions, see Section 4.2.3 of the dissertation.

    • Method Detail

      • applyFeatureTransformation

        public static void applyFeatureTransformation(FeatTransf.FeatureTransformationType ftType,
                                              FeatTransf.FeatureTransformationFunction ftFunction)
        This function is used for transforming the (word, feature) pair weights using a transformation function. It can either be used for transforming the weights before or after smoothing, depending on when it is called.
        Parameters:
        ftType - the type of feature transformation (determining when and on which values the transformation happens)
        ftFunction - the feature transformation function to be used

      • applyFeatureTransformation

        public static <T,V> double applyFeatureTransformation(FeatTransf.FeatureTransformationType ftType,
                                                      FeatTransf.FeatureTransformationFunction ftFunction,
                                                      java.util.HashMap<T,java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap,
                                                      java.util.HashMap<T,java.lang.Double> frequency1Map,
                                                      java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> frequency2Map,
                                                      java.util.HashMap<T,java.lang.Double> frequency1MapOfGivenPOS,
                                                      java.util.HashMap<T,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>> valueToRankMaps)
        This function is used for transforming the (word, feature) pair feature values in @param tuplesMap using a transformation function.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of keys in @param frequency1Map
        V - the type of keys in @param frequency2Map
        Parameters:
        ftType - the type of feature transformation (determining when and on which values the transformation happens)
        ftFunction - the feature transformation function to be used
        tuplesMap - the map containing the (word, feature) pairs
        frequency1Map - the map containing the frequency of words in the given type of relation
        frequency2Map - the map containing the frequency of features in the given type of relation
        frequency1MapOfGivenPOS - the map containing the frequency of words of a given POS
        valueToRankMaps - the map containing the value to rank mappings for each word of a given POS
        Returns:
        the sum of the differences in values due to the feature transformation in the given type of relation, when needed

      • transformFeature

        public static <T> java.lang.Double transformFeature(FeatTransf.FeatureTransformationFunction ftFunction,
                                                    T word1,
                                                    java.lang.Double value,
                                                    java.util.HashMap<T,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>> valueToRankMaps)
        This function transforms a feature value for a word using a transformation function.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of keys in @param valueToRankMaps
        Parameters:
        ftFunction - the feature transformation function to be used
        word1 - the word for which the featurevalue is transformed
        value - the feature value to be transformed
        valueToRankMaps - the map containing the value to rank mappings for each word of a given POS
        Returns:
        the transformed value

      • createRankMapsForFeatureTransformation

        public static <V,X,Y,Z> void createRankMapsForFeatureTransformation(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> allWordSet,
                                                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap1,
                                                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap2,
                                                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap3,
                                                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap4,
                                                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>> valueToRankMaps)
        This function converts the feature values for each word stored in the input tuplesMaps into ranks, and stores these value to rank mappings for the word in @param valueToRankMaps.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of features in @param tuplesMap1
        X - the type of features in @param tuplesMap2
        Y - the type of features in @param tuplesMap3
        Z - the type of features in @param tuplesMap4
        Parameters:
        allWordSet - a set containing all the words of a given POS
        tuplesMap1 - one of the input tuplesMaps containing the (word, feature) pairs
        tuplesMap2 - one of the input tuplesMaps containing the (word, feature) pairs
        tuplesMap3 - one of the input tuplesMaps containing the (word, feature) pairs
        tuplesMap4 - one of the input tuplesMaps containing the (word, feature) pairs
        valueToRankMaps - the map to which the value to rank mappings for each word of a given POS should be stored
